department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Bowl with rounded flaring sides, and narrow horizontal rim. Wide band of inscription in long oval compartments with circular ones between, all with arabesque details around top of outside. Inside and lower part of outside covered with interlacing circles. On inside detail worn off, on outside filled with inscription and arabesque. Boss on center of bottom inside with badly worn arabesque ornament. Shallow base-rim. The ware shows it has been used and must be fairly old.
title: Bowl
